item.title: By: Ed Brill
item.dc:creator: Ed Brill
item.description: <p>with no offense to my friends who live there, I agree with your observation. Just isn't much "there" there. You didn't really miss it.</p>
item.content:encoded: with no offense to my friends who live there, I agree with your observation. Just isn’t much “there” there. You didn’t really miss it.

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>I feel the same about LA - in the couple of times there have never found a "centre" Hope the journey goes well - Dad says it is a very strange feeling to lose that day! We are off on Thursday, so hopefully will catch one more episode....</p>
item.content:encoded: I feel the same about LA – in the couple of times there have never found a “centre” Hope the journey goes well – Dad says it is a very strange feeling to lose that day! We are off on Thursday, so hopefully will catch one more episode….
